titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Department of Housing and Urban Development should not interfere with the exercise of the right of free speech, the right of free association, or the right to petition the Government for a redress of grievances.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S13934-13936)
Referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 10/3/1994--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Department of Housing and Urban Development should not enforce the Fair Housing Act in a way that would interfere with the exercise of the right of free speech, the right of free association, or the right to petition the Government for a redress of grievances.
